name: Rally
long_description:
Rally is a financial platform for businesses that operate vehicle fleets. We're starting in Europe, where over â‚¬1 trillion is spent annually on fuel, charging, maintenance, and other fleet expenses - most of it still running on legacy networks built in the 1960s.

We set a new standard for fleet finance by streamlining payments and automating workflows across bookkeeping, credit, and driver payroll, helping real-world businesses like delivery services, construction crews, and service technicians stay in control and operate efficiently.
